page.title: 02 MY DAY 1.MORNING
page.content: I get up at 7.45 a.m.,first I make my bed,then I get dressed.At 8.00 I have my breakfast of cereals a glass of milk and sometimes a grapefruit. My Mum brushes my hair and gives me my bus money.I put my books in my school bag and put my coat on.I set out to the bus stop at 8.30 and sometimes I meet my friend Claire Taylor.Most of the village children walk to school.I get the{bus}because I live outside the village.Before the whistle goes my friend and I go in to do our duty as prefects. After morning assembly I usually do maths,english,reading and handwriting. I have lunch at 12.10pm(My favourite lunch is fish,chips and peas).
